CustomField.description: If selected, creates the Project Margin dataset in the PS Cloud Core Analytics app. This dataset is required to create the Total Project Margin (Workspace) dashboard in the PS Cloud Advanced Analytics app.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected, creates the Project Margin dataset in the PS Cloud Core Analytics app. This dataset is required to create the Total Project Margin (Workspace) dashboard in the PS Cloud Advanced Analytics app.
CustomField.label: Project Margin
